name: Fireball Excellent
description:
Fireball Excellentis a 3D shooting balls game, realistic physics, dozens of balls, leaderboards, and planet-loads of fun! Just tap and hold to fire balls towards towers and crash stacks. Don’t hit cars on the tracks when you fire balls. When you finish crashing some towers, you can get some cute pets. collect them as many as you can. There are a lot of colorful scenes that keep you from getting bored.
Features:
- Easy to play - just hold and fire balls.
- Fire balls with beautiful scene and colorful themes.
- Fire balls in infinite levels and a lot of fun.
- Enjoy the various game modes with simple control.
- Challenge mode.
